MESSAGE.JP: 子を下りたすぐ正面の壁にスイッチはあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Right at the bottom of the ladder, there was a switch on the wall in front of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right at the bottom of the ladder, there was a switch on the wall in front of us.

MESSAGE.JP: の上に飾られたプレートには…『Go』に続く字がコインでひっかかれたように消えていた…。
MESSAGE.EN: Above it was a plate that read ❛Go❜... it looked like the rest had been scratched away with a coin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Above it was a plate that read ❛Go❜... it looked like the rest had been scratched away with a coin.

MESSAGE.JP: れがヒントのはずだったのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was probably a hint...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was probably a hint...

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「はは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Haha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Haha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたの、沙耶」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong, Saya?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong, Saya?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ここの文字がね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝These characters are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝These characters are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「って、沙耶!?　いつの間に呼び捨て!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Saya!? You're leaving off the honorific now!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Saya!? You're leaving off the honorific now!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、沙耶さんって言うと、なんだかお年寄りみたいで…ねぇ、沙耶さんや、みたいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, when I say ❛Saya-san❜ it makes it feel like we're old... you know what I mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, when I say ❛Saya-san❜ it makes it feel like we're old... you know what I mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そんなのあなたのさじ加減ひとつじゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That's not for you to decide...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That's not for you to decide...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一応段階は踏んできてるし、そろそろいいかな、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really? It seemed like a good time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really? It seemed like a good time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そんな頃合いを勝手に決めないでくれる？　というかあなた責任取れるの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Could you not single-handedly decide when is a good time? And can you even take responsibility!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Could you not single-handedly decide when is a good time? And can you even take responsibility!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「名前を呼び捨てただけで、何の責任問題に発展するのかよくわかんないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All I did was leave off the honorific... I don't know what you mean by taking responsibility.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All I did was leave off the honorific... I don't know what you mean by taking responsibility.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「それぐらいなんてーの、希少価値が高いのよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Doing something like that is a very special privilege.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Doing something like that is a very special privilege.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「沙耶さんは特別なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You are special.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You are special.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そうよ。なんたって、凄腕のスパイよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That's right. I'm a world-class spy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That's right. I'm a world-class spy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「それを呼び捨てにできるのは、なんていうか、本当のパートナー、いや、別の意味のパートナー、というか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝The only one who can leave off the honorific is, how should I should say it... a true partner... no, a different kind of partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝The only one who can leave off the honorific is, how should I should say it... a true partner... no, a different kind of partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかったよ、もうちょっと待つよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll wait a little longer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll wait a little longer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「いや、時間の問題じゃなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's not a matter of time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's not a matter of time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あーもぅ、いいわっ、沙耶って呼び捨ててもっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Ah, whatever. Just call me ❛Saya.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Ah, whatever. Just call me ❛Saya.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　もう別の意味のパートナーにしてくれるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? So I'm already that other kind of partner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? So I'm already that other kind of partner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「ぅなーーーーーーーっっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Gaaaaaaaaaaah!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Gaaaaaaaaaaah!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなたわかって言ってんの!?　あたしをおちょくって遊んでんの!?　なんなの!!　どっちなのよ!!　その歳で責任取れるのか!!　取らせてあげようかしら!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Do you actually know what you're saying!? Or are you just messing with me!? Well!? Which is it!? Can you take responsibility at that age!? Are you going to!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Do you actually know what you're saying!? Or are you just messing with me!? Well!? Which is it!? Can you take responsibility at that age!? Are you going to!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、そんな取り乱さないで！　髪の毛そんなにかき回したら、ぼさぼさになっちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't get so upset! If your hair flies around that much, it'll get ruffled.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't get so upset! If your hair flies around that much, it'll get ruffled.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、責任ってなに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And what do you mean by ❛responsibility?❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And what do you mean by ❛responsibility?❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「きょげーーーーーっっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Kyogeeeeeeee!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Kyogeeeeeeee!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、女の子がそんなきょげーなんて言ったら駄目だってばっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, girls shouldn't say things like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, girls shouldn't say things like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あんたがもてあそぼうってんなら、どんな奇声でも発してやるわよっ、ふんがーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If you're just going to toy with me, I'll say whatever I want, fungaaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If you're just going to toy with me, I'll say whatever I want, fungaaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どーどーどー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There, there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There, there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やされる…。
MESSAGE.EN: He was comforting me...
MESSAGE.Translation: He was comforting me...

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「いい、理樹くん。落ち着いて聞いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Okay, Riki-kun. Calm down and listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Okay, Riki-kun. Calm down and listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、僕はずっと落ち着いてるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've been calm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've been calm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 子を下りたすぐ正面の壁にスイッチはあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Right at the bottom of the ladder, there was a switch on the wall in front of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right at the bottom of the ladder, there was a switch on the wall in front of us.

MESSAGE.JP: の上に飾られたプレートには…『Go』に続く字がコインでひっかかれたように消えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Above it was a plate that read ❛Go❜... it looked like the rest had been scratched away with a coin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Above it was a plate that read ❛Go❜... it looked like the rest had been scratched away with a coin.

MESSAGE.JP: 変わらずなんのヒントもない。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected, no hints.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected, no hints.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「はは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Haha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Haha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたの、沙耶」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong, Saya?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong, Saya?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん、そう呼ぶんだ。理樹くんはここで。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right. He called me that here.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right. He called me that here.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれっ、スルーしてくれた…これは意外な反応だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, that didn't faze you... that's unexpected...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, that didn't faze you... that's unexpected...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「どうしたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今僕、沙耶って、呼び捨てにしたんだよ。結構勇気がいったんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just now I called you ❛Saya.❜ It took a lot of courage...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just now I called you ❛Saya.❜ It took a lot of courage...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「でしょうねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I can imagine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I can imagine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さん付けでもよかったんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I should have put the ❛-san❜ on the end...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I should have put the ❛-san❜ on the end...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「なんだかお年寄りみたいなんでしょ。ねぇ、沙耶さんや、みたいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝But it makes it feel like we're old, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝But it makes it feel like we're old, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわぁ、どうしてわかったの!?　そう考えてたんだよ、実際…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, how did you know!? That's what I was just thinking....❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, how did you know!? That's what I was just thinking....❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなた、この後、『そんなのやだよっ、一緒に、いや、僕が先にいくよっ』、て言うわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Later you'll say, ❛No way, let's go together, or even better, I'll go ahead.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Later you'll say, ❛No way, let's go together, or even better, I'll go ahead.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はは、それ、ほんとに言ったら、すごいね、予知能力じゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haha, if I really end up saying that, you have some awesome precognitive abilities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haha, if I really end up saying that, you have some awesome precognitive abilities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「すごいスパイにはあるのよ、すごいでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Awesome spies have them, since we're awesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Awesome spies have them, since we're awesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、すごくても超能力はないと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't think being awesome makes you a psychic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't think being awesome makes you a psychic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「じゃあ、ええと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, umm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, umm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くん。落ち着いて聞いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun. calm down and listen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun. calm down and listen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay... what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay... what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 子を下りたすぐ正面の壁にスイッチはあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Right at the bottom of the ladder, there was a switch on the wall in front of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right at the bottom of the ladder, there was a switch on the wall in front of us.

MESSAGE.JP: の上に飾られたプレートには…『Go』に続く字がコインでひっかかれたように消えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Above it was a plate that read ❛Go❜... it looked like the rest had been scratched away with a coin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Above it was a plate that read ❛Go❜... it looked like the rest had been scratched away with a coin.

MESSAGE.JP: 変わらずなんのヒントもない。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected, no hints.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected, no hints.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「これからは沙耶と呼びなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝From now on, call me Saya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝From now on, call me Saya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええ!?　今、僕、それを言い出そうとして勇気を振り絞ってたところなんだよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What!? I was just about to muster the courage to say that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What!? I was just about to muster the courage to say that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしてわかったの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did you know!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did you know!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「超能力」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'm psychic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm psychic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほんとに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「すごいスパイは人の心ぐらい読めるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝An awesome spy can read a person's heart.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝An awesome spy can read a person's heart.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、それは恥ずかしいよ!?　今、読まないでよ!?　いろいろ考えちゃってるから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, that's embarrassing! Don't read it right now! I've got a lot on my mind....❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, that's embarrassing! Don't read it right now! I've got a lot on my mind....❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「安心しなさい。プライバシーの侵害はしないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Don't worry. I'm not going to invade your privacy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Don't worry. I'm not going to invade your privacy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、よかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, thank god...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, thank god...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って、今のもプライバシーの侵害だよね!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, didn't you just invade it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, didn't you just invade it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「いい、理樹くん？　そんなことを言い合いしてる場合じゃないのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Hey, Riki-kun. This isn't the time to be saying stuff like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Hey, Riki-kun. This isn't the time to be saying stuff like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くん。落ち着いて聞いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, calm down and listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, calm down and listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay... what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay... what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 変わらずなんのヒントのない部屋。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the same hint-less room.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the same hint-less room.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くん、これからは沙耶と呼びなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, from now on call me Saya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, from now on call me Saya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええ!?　今、僕、それを言い出そうとして勇気を振り絞ってたところなんだよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What!? I was just about to muster the courage to say that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What!? I was just about to muster the courage to say that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「超能力。すごいスパイは人の心ぐらい読めるのよ。でも安心なさい。プライバシーの侵害はしないわ。でもこれってプライバシーの侵害だよね!?っていう突っ込みは受け付けません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I am psychic. Awesome spies can read people's hearts. But don't worry, I won't invade your privacy. And don't respond with ❛But isn't this an invasion of privacy!?❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I am psychic. Awesome spies can read people's hearts. But don't worry, I won't invade your privacy. And don't respond with ❛But isn't this an invasion of privacy!?❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すごい…僕の考えをことごとく言い当ててる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Incredible... you said exactly what I was thinking...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Incredible... you said exactly what I was thinking...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そんなことを言い合いしてる場合じゃないのよ。いい、理樹くん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝This isn't the time to be saying stuff like that. Ready, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝This isn't the time to be saying stuff like that. Ready, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay... what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay... what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「このフロアには通ったことがチェックされるセンサーが各通路につけられてるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝On this floor there are sensors in every corridor that check whether you've passed through or not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝On this floor there are sensors in every corridor that check whether you've passed through or not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へぇ、よくわかったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, it's amazing you figured that out right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, it's amazing you figured that out right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「進むべきルートを間違えると、梯子まで辿り着けない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If we take the wrong route, we won't be able to reach the ladder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If we take the wrong route, we won't be able to reach the ladder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「上の階みたいに、字になるように進むのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Will it be in the shape of something like on the last floor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Will it be in the shape of something like on the last floor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「恐らくね。でも、ヒントが塗りつぶされてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Probably. But the hint was scratched out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Probably. But the hint was scratched out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、そうなんだ。ノーヒントってのは厄介だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, yeah. It's bad if we don't have any hints.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, yeah. It's bad if we don't have any hints.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の字も駄目で、５の字も駄目…。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't an 8 or a 5...
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't an 8 or a 5...

MESSAGE.JP: っぱりあたしが考えるべきでないのよっ。
MESSAGE.EN: I really shouldn't have been the one trying to figure this out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really shouldn't have been the one trying to figure this out.

MESSAGE.JP: こは理樹くん頼みだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to leave this to Riki-kun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to leave this to Riki-kun.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「そこで、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝So, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝So, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーん…。
MESSAGE.EN: Hmm...
MESSAGE.Translation: Hmm...

MESSAGE.JP: たしは腕組みし、スイッチを見直した。
MESSAGE.EN: I crossed my arms and looked at the switch again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I crossed my arms and looked at the switch again.

MESSAGE.JP: うね、と曖昧に頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded ambiguously.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded ambiguously.

MESSAGE.JP: にやってんだ、あたしは…。
MESSAGE.EN: What was I doing...
MESSAGE.Translation: What was I doing...

MESSAGE.JP: にかく５の字だ。
MESSAGE.EN: At any rate, was in the shape of a 5.
MESSAGE.Translation: At any rate, was in the shape of a 5.

MESSAGE.JP: たしの時と同じように８の字を描いてみるか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if it was still an 8, like last time...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if it was still an 8, like last time...

MESSAGE.JP: うね、と曖昧に頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded ambiguously.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded ambiguously.

MESSAGE.JP: にやってんだ、あたしは…。
MESSAGE.EN: What was I doing...
MESSAGE.Translation: What was I doing...

MESSAGE.JP: にかく８の字だ。
MESSAGE.EN: At any rate, it was in the shape of an 8.
MESSAGE.Translation: At any rate, it was in the shape of an 8.

MESSAGE.JP: Go』の後にかき消された跡…。
MESSAGE.EN: Those marks after the ❛Go❜...
MESSAGE.Translation: Those marks after the ❛Go❜...

MESSAGE.JP: んの法則性もないギザギザな疵痕。
MESSAGE.EN: The scratches had no rhyme or reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: The scratches had no rhyme or reason.

MESSAGE.JP: ーん…。
MESSAGE.EN: Hmm...
MESSAGE.Translation: Hmm...

MESSAGE.JP: Go』…そんな字、描いて歩けないし…。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no way to trace ❛Go❜ along the path...
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no way to trace ❛Go❜ along the path...

MESSAGE.Translation: Was there a way to read what was under the scratches...

MESSAGE.Translation: But it's completely destroyed... maybe if I traced it with my finger...

MESSAGE.EN: Go, ❝go❞...
MESSAGE.Translation: Go, ❝go❞...

MESSAGE.EN: Ah...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah...

MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, wasn't that Japanese for ❛5❜!?

MESSAGE.Translation: But if that was true, it could also be part of an 8...

MESSAGE.EN: No, it might not work since we'd be passing through the same spot twice...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, it might not work since we'd be passing through the same spot twice...

MESSAGE.JP: の字を書いて、そこで正解を待ってみたらどうだ？

MESSAGE.Translation: What if I walked through in the shape of a 5 and then waited to see what would happen?

MESSAGE.JP: してみる価値はある！

MESSAGE.Translation: It was worth a shot!

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「理樹くん、出発よ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, we're off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、何か思いついたんだ。さすがスパイだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, you had an idea. As expected of a spy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, you had an idea. As expected of a spy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「お願いだから、ハードル上げないでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Please, don't raise the bar for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Please, don't raise the bar for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、そんなつもりは…まあ、気楽にいこうよ。失敗した時はまた考えればいいしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, that's not what I meant... let's just go and if we fail we can think of something else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, that's not what I meant... let's just go and if we fail we can think of something else.❞

MESSAGE.EN: ...But I would die every time we do.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But I would die every time we do.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Anything from you?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing I can suggest to a pro like you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing I can suggest to a pro like you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 方ない。自力でいくか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh well. I'd have to figure it out myself...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh well. I'd have to figure it out myself...

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's true that I'm a pro, but what I want to hear is your opinion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えー…さしでがましいなあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I really don't think I should have a say here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I really don't think I should have a say here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「あなたが頭を使う係になってるの」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You're in charge of this kind of work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、そうなの…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, I guess...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You are. That's why I want you to just lay whatever you're thinking out there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: He crossed his arms and started staring at the ❛Go❜ on the wall.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't these scratch marks have some kind of meaning?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't these scratch marks have some kind of meaning?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「というと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Such as?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Such as?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The shape. Couldn't it mean 'go in a zig-zag?'❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The shape. Couldn't it mean 'go in a zig-zag?'❞

MESSAGE.JP: っ、とあたしはその言葉に反応して、壁に寄っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: His suggestion intrigued me, so I walked up to the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: His suggestion intrigued me, so I walked up to the wall.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well... there are cracks in the wall. I could easily blow them up with a bit of explosives.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I laid explosive on the wall.

MESSAGE.EN: Just a little bit in two cracks should be okay.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just a little bit in two cracks should be okay.

MESSAGE.JP: り少なくなった着火用コードを毎度毎度くるくると解いていく。

MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I was running out, I kept unwinding the ignition chord.

MESSAGE.JP: どーーーん！

MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam.*

MESSAGE.Translation: Amidst the cloud of dust, I put a handkerchief over my mouth and stood in awe at what I saw.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...A hidden path.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And it goes southwest. That's the start of the zig-zag shape.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「お手柄だわ、理樹くん！　大好きよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Good job, Riki-kun! I love you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Good job, Riki-kun! I love you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: わ。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Takin' a shit!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, are you trying to even things out again?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not so sure about a girl saying ❛takin' a shit❜...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Then what should I do with the shit!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not sure that's what you should be changing...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I think it's fine if you don't take anything...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝But then I'm just an embarrassing girl!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong with that?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Everything.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Those were honest words, so it's okay. I'm really happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Those were honest words, so it's okay. I'm really happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「生理的に？」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝About everything?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, maybe...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Hmm... Something still bugs me, but whatever...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Low kick!❞

MESSAGE.JP: き。

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oww... that hurt a little...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oww... that hurt a little...❞

MESSAGE.EN: Crap, I pointlessly hurt Riki-kun to hide my embarrassment again!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Crap, I pointlessly hurt Riki-kun to hide my embarrassment again!!

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm fine...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You aren't doing this for no reason, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You aren't doing this for no reason, right?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝No... not really...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I just can't calm down after saying something like that...

MESSAGE.Translation: If I was always going to lash out in embarrassment, my days with Riki-kun would leave him battered and bruised...

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Regardless, looks like this was the right way.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Ah, yeah, we found a hidden path!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't that what's important...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: It was as if I was just some girl in love! What happened to being a world-class spy... what a mess...

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「いきましょ…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Let's go...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't sound excited...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I headed for the next room and went through the broken wall.

MESSAGE.JP: しい部屋に出た。

MESSAGE.Translation: We found ourselves in a new room.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝So this place is next...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I found it right away.

MESSAGE.JP: に爆薬をしかけに入る。

MESSAGE.JP: どーーーん！

MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam!*

MESSAGE.Translation: Amidst the cloud of dust, I put a handkerchief over my mouth and slipped through the newly made hole.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝So we aren't using the corridors at all. Just this zig-zag. We keep going like we're cutting up the map.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝After activating the sensors, we can't go in any direction.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝There's one weak point in the rooms. The cracks.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Even if we don't use explosives, we could probably break them with a good kick.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、また壁を破壊する。
MESSAGE.EN: As I spoke, I destroyed another wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I spoke, I destroyed another wall.

MESSAGE.JP: た同じことを繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I continued to blow up more walls.
MESSAGE.Translation: I continued to blow up more walls.

MESSAGE.JP: う爆薬はあまり残ってない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was running low on explosives.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was running low on explosives.

MESSAGE.JP: 算して使ってきたけど、やっぱり難しいものね。
MESSAGE.EN: I was trying to conserve as much as I could, but this is going to be difficult.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was trying to conserve as much as I could, but this is going to be difficult.

MESSAGE.JP: どーーーん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam!*

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋へ。
MESSAGE.EN: To the next room.
MESSAGE.Translation: To the next room.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「最後の部屋だわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝This is the last room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝This is the last room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とり。
MESSAGE.EN: *Clunk.*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clunk.*

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶@「今の音は正解ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝That sound means we were right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝That sound means we were right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の中心が浮き上がっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The middle of the floor rose up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The middle of the floor rose up.

MESSAGE.Translation: As though a lid had opened, the staircase down appeared.

MESSAGE.Translation: We had finally reached the 8th floor...

MESSAGE.JP: れは奴と対峙したフロア。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the floor where I ran into that guy.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the floor where I ran into that guy.

MESSAGE.JP: ないはずの人間がそこに居る。

MESSAGE.Translation: A person who shouldn't have been was there.

MESSAGE.Translation: I know because I shouldn't have been here, either.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Want to rest a little?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Good idea.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: When he said it, I finally noticed that I was exhausted from the constant tension.

MESSAGE.Translation: I rolled up my sleeve and checked the time on my watch.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's morning already...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun said the same thing.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm tired...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it's not like we can come back and finish tomorrow...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Hey, Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん？」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Do you think...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...you'll always like me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...you'll always like me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えぇっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeeh...!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeeh...!?❞

MESSAGE.EN: Maybe that was too straight-forward.
